note: PMNS reference values for the pmns_full_pipeline module from NuFIT 5.3 (2024) with SK-atm data. Asymmetric NuFIT uncertainties are symmetrized using the larger of the ± errors. Used only for a diagnostic χ² after PMNS canonicalization (rephasing + column permutation).

reference.definition: Mixing angles in the PDG convention (θ12, θ13, θ23) reported as sin²θij, and δCP in degrees. These are effective low-energy fit parameters; they are not running MSbar couplings.
reference.scheme: NuFIT 5.3 (2024) global fit; effective low-energy parameters; not a running MSbar coupling
